title: The Mysterious Tortoiseshell
description: A dimly lit scene featuring a tortoiseshell cat near a concrete ledge, with another cat partially visible in the shadows near a wall. A large green dumpster is on the left side, while a wrapped pallet leans against a wall on the right. The setting is quiet and industrial, framed by lush green hedges and tall trees in the background. A white wire cuts across the image diagonally.

title: Hedge Path Watcher
description: A fluffy gray-and-white cat lies relaxed on a shadowy concrete area, backed by green bushes. The lighting gives the scene a peaceful atmosphere.

title: Curious by the Bins
description: The same two tortoiseshell cats are seen walking down a narrow, shaded path toward a sunlit stack of pallets and paint buckets.

title: Sunlit Pause
description: A wider view of the same alleyway shows two tortoiseshell cats standing alert at the entrance, with greenery and the building surrounding them.

title: Into the Light
description: Three tortoiseshell cats (two in front, one deeper in the alley) stand near a blue fabric wall and a tree. The lighting is dim and moody.

title: Frozen in the Spotlight
description: Two dark tortoiseshell cats face each other on a concrete sidewalk in front of a brown door and fabric partition.

title: Street Encounter
description: The ginger cat is now standing more prominently in the sunlight with strong shadows, in front of the same BMW and under a tree.

title: Out from the Shadows
description: The ginger cat walks toward a sunlit area from a shaded corner near the bins. A black car (BMW) is seen in the background.

title: Alley Watch
description: The same ginger cat sits calmly in bright sunlight near a red fire extinguisher. There's a visible trash bin on the side and a white building wall.

title: Secret Passage
description: A ginger cat stands next to two recycling bins (labeled 'EVSEL ATIK' and 'KÂĞIT PLASTIK METAL ATIK') in front of a wooden building, partly in shadow.

title: Shadow Nap
description: A ginger-and-white cat stands on a dirt path between tall hedges, bathed in a soft patch of light.
